title: Salih Korkmaz
text:
Salih Korkmaz (born 1 January 1997) is a Turkish <a href="racewalking">racewalking</a> athlete.
In 2017, he finished in 4th place in the <a href="2017%20European%20Athletics%20U23%20Championships%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%2020%20kilometres%20walk">men's 20 kilometres walk</a> at the <a href="2017%20European%20Athletics%20U23%20Championships">2017 European Athletics U23 Championships</a> held in Bydgoszcz, Poland.
Representing Turkey at the <a href="2019%20World%20Athletics%20Championships">2019 World Athletics Championships</a>, he placed fifth in <a href="2019%20World%20Athletics%20Championships%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%2020%20kilometres%20walk">20 kilometres walk</a>. He won the silver medal at the <a href="2019%20European%20Athletics%20U23%20Championships%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%2020%20kilometres%20walk">2019 European Athletics U23 Championships</a> held in <a href="G%C3%A4vle">Gävle</a>, Sweden.
